action.command: /give @s minecraft:blaze_rod[minecraft:custom_data={"custom_item": true,"id": "generic:move_to_look_at"},minecraft:consumable={animation:"none",consume_seconds:10000,sound:{sound_id:ambient.nether.basalt_deltas.heavy_click1,range:0}},item_name= "目光跃迁杖",lore=[{text:"传送到你看向的位置"}]]

/give @s minecraft:breeze_rod[minecraft:custom_data={"custom_item": true,"id": "generic:pick_up_entity"},minecraft:consumable={animation:"none",consume_seconds:10000,sound:{sound_id:ambient.nether.basalt_deltas.heavy_click1,range:0}},item_name= "生物压缩杖",lore=[{text:"将你看向的生物打包带走"},{text:"最远只能带走前方目视6格的生物"}]]
